title: Famed Fraudster Exposed as Upstanding Citizen
author: Skyler Toyota
md_content:
This morning, documents mailed anonymously to this blog revealed that famed fraudster Steve Placeholder was in fact an upstanding citizen, disappointing legions of his fans ^\[1\]^.
> ## Interview with a Fan
> "I am still in shock... Steve, a man I have looked up to since my credit card skimming days, apparently hasn't so much as jaywalked. Allegedly, he even cleans up the litter at his local park! Ridiculous. An entire brand, built on lies. What a shame!"
> - John Doe
